packages.name: Package
packages.durationNote: All packages have a 20-day duration for certain benefits, but your income potential continues indefinitely.
packages.instantRewardSubtitle: Your fast-track to infinite income. No expiry. No rebuy. Just results. Instant reward.
packages.useRewardsDescription: Use your rewards to activate your package
packages.approveDescription: Approve the contract to activate your package

income.title: Income Streams
income.subtitle: Multiple ways to earn passive income
income.stream1Description: Rewarded instantly on every activation when new members join through your referral link.
income.stream1Detail: The Activation Bonus is an instant reward you receive when someone joins SBAL through your referral. This is a direct 5% commission paid in BST coin immediately upon activation.
income.stream1Example: If someone purchases a $100 Ignite package through your referral, you instantly receive $5 worth of BST coin.
income.stream1Item2: Calculated as 5% of the package price
income.stream1Item3: No limit to how many activation bonuses you can earn
income.stream1Item4: Paid in BST coin directly to your wallet
income.stream2Description: Instant payout with just 1 referral, with the reward amount depending on your package level.
income.stream2Detail: The Booster Reward is an instant payout you receive when you refer just 1 person to buy any Smart Base package. The reward amount depends on your package level.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawal Process
withdrawal.subtitle: Simple and fast withdrawals
withdrawal.noteText: All withdrawals are processed within 24 hours, often much faster. BST coin can be exchanged on-platform or transferred to external wallets.
withdrawal.upgradesText: 20% of all earnings are automatically locked for your next package upgrade, helping you seamlessly climb the income ladder.
withdrawal.feesText: Only 9% fee on withdrawals, used to support platform liquidity. Direct wallet transfers have zero fees.

timeline.title: Works
timeline.subtitle: SBAL = Simple Action. Big Leverage.

step1.title: Buy Once
step1.description: Make a one-time purchase of any Smart Base package to activate your SBAL income system.

step2.title: Refer
step2.description: Share your SBAL opportunity with others to unlock booster rewards and referral income.

step3.title: Earn Forever
step3.description: Enjoy continuous income through multiple streams without any rebuy requirements.

timeline.tagline: One-Time Purchase. Lifetime Power. Infinite Potential.

team.title: Team
team.subtitle: The brilliant minds behind the SBAL SYSTEM revolution
team.communityDescription: Connect with our team and thousands of SBAL members worldwide. Get early access to updates, special events, and exclusive opportunities.

member1.description: Pioneering the integration of blockchain technology with real-world financial systems. Creator of the core SBAL algorithms that power our revolutionary income system.

member2.description: Specializing in community-driven growth models and network effect optimization. Elena has helped scale multiple crypto projects from concept to global adoption.

member3.description: Expert in designing sustainable economic models for blockchain ecosystems. Marcus ensures the SBAL system maintains perfect balance between growth and stability.

member4.description: Bridging the gap between complex crypto systems and intuitive user interfaces. Olivia ensures that SBAL remains accessible to both beginners and experts alike.
